+      if (current != NULL) {                                                                \
+           fatal("jclass for %s re-initialized: " PTR_FORMAT " -> " PTR_FORMAT,             \
+           current_class_name, p2i(current), p2i(k));                                       \
+      }                                                                                     \
+      className::_class = k;                                                                \
+    }                                                                                       \
